title: Ethernet connection problems
body:
Hi guys, hope you are doing well <3
Couple days ago i got a new internet and it is 24 mb or smth 
Using wireless i get only 18 Mpb of it :) but the game and the internet becomes more inestable, so i decided to use Ethernet cable !
later i started having crazy problems my pc got only 3 Mbp and the would later become unplayable such as Minions freezing towers freezing champions moving and seeing the enemy champions in the fog of war, can anyone tell me how can i deal with my problem ? 
Thank you :){{champion:32}}

replies.body: I hope your day is going well too friend, though I'm sorry to hear about these connection issues.  :/  It sounds like you're experiencing some packet loss which can result in those kind of delays.  Since you've made some adjustments to your networks, you may need to readjust your settings and make sure network is strong and stable!  My suggestion would be to go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune things up and get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
